title: What is the most horrible Christmas song? - Quora

response.answer_text: Paul McCartney’s “Wonderful Christmastime”. At one point, I worked for a big box retailer that played this on heavy rotation beginning in October. I cringed every time the chorus came on.

I'm going with “Do They Know It’s Christmas?” by Band Aid. Not because of the entirety of the song but for that one infamous lyric sung by Bono, “Tonight thank God it’s them instead of you”. Thankfully Bono has since changed the lyric to, “Tonight we’re reaching out and touching you.” If you are not familiar with the song or the lyric I am mentioning, here it is: Band Aid - Do They Know It's Christmas 1984 HD
